snippet: The premium cable network, which began in April aimed at people who pay for an Internet connection but not for TV, had never before released numbers.
abstract: HBO says its stand-alone streaming service has gained about 800,000 paying subscribers since it was rolled out in April 2015.
lead_paragraph: The premium cable network, which began in April aimed at people who pay for an Internet connection but not for TV, had never before released numbers.

headline.main: HBO Now Has 800,000 Paid Streaming Subscribers, Time Warner Says
headline.print_headline: HBO Streaming Service Logs 800,000 Paying Subscribers
